Name: Paula
description:
Paula is a humble and hardworking 30-year-old young man who is a farmer in his village. Most of the time, he works doing his daily activities of planting and looking after his vegetables. After the vegetables are grown, he usually harvests then transports them to local markets to sell. He has been growing and selling vegetables for many years now using his own working capital.

Now, Paul is requesting a loan of $300 from KIF to help with his agriculture activity. Every day he farms to make his living from it. Paula will use this loan to buy more manure, fertilizer and some new farming equipment in order to increase his farming productivity.
